sqls.sql: SELECT IO.*, CU.USERNAME, C.DICTNAME_S FROM AT_A_SM_INSTORERECORD IO, CORE_USER CU, AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS B, AT_CM_BS_COREDICTIONARY C WHERE 1 = 1 AND IO.STORAGE_IN_WORKER_S = CU.USERCODE AND IO.MATERIELCODE_S = B.MATERIALCODE_S AND B.MATGRP_S = C.ERPCODE_S AND C.DICTCODE_S LIKE '308%' <#if materielcode_s??> and IO.MATERIELCODE_S = :materielcode_s </#if> <#if materielname_s??> and IO.DESCRIPTION = :materielname_s </#if> <#if materialgroup_s??> and C.DICTNAME_S = :materialgroup_s </#if> <#if in_location_s??> and IO.IN_LOCATION_S = :in_location_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and IO.BARCODE_S = :barcode_s </#if> <#if vehicles_code_s??> and IO.VEHICLES_CODE_S=:vehicles_code_s </#if> <#if begintime?? && endtime??> and to_char(IO.in_time_t,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') between :begintime and :endtime </#if> and IO.RECORD_FLAG_S = 'A' <#if s_factory_s??> and IO.S_FACTORY_S = :s_factory_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by IO.atr_key desc </#if>

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AT_A_SM_INSTORERECORD IO, CORE_USER CU, AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS B, AT_CM_BS_COREDICTIONARY C WHERE 1 = 1 AND IO.STORAGE_IN_WORKER_S = CU.USERCODE AND IO.MATERIELCODE_S = B.MATERIALCODE_S AND B.MATGRP_S = C.ERPCODE_S AND C.DICTCODE_S LIKE '308%' <#if materielcode_s??> and IO.MATERIELCODE_S = :materielcode_s </#if> <#if materielname_s??> and IO.MATERIELNAME_S = :materielname_s </#if> <#if materialgroup_s??> and C.DICTNAME_S = :materialgroup_s </#if> <#if in_location_s??> and IO.IN_LOCATION_S = :in_location_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and IO.BARCODE_S = :barcode_s </#if> <#if vehicles_code_s??> and IO.VEHICLES_CODE_S=:vehicles_code_s </#if> <#if begintime?? && endtime??> and to_char(IO.in_time_t,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') between :begintime and :endtime </#if> and IO.RECORD_FLAG_S = 'A' <#if s_factory_s??> and IO.S_FACTORY_S = :s_factory_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by IO.atr_key desc </#if>

sql.comment: 查出物料编码显示在JSP页面下拉列表处

sqls.sql: SELECT t.materialcode_s, t.materialdesc_s, t.oldmatcode_s, m.erpcode_s FROM at_int_sap_materials t, at_cm_bs_coredictionary m WHERE t.matgrp_s = m.erpcode_s AND m.dictcode_s LIKE '308%' AND ( m.erpcode_s LIKE '301%' OR m.erpcode_s IN ( '301001', '301002', '301004', '301022' ) )

sql.comment: 查出物料名称显示在JSP页面下拉列表处

sqls.sql: SELECT t.materialcode_s, t.materialdesc_s, t.oldmatcode_s, m.erpcode_s FROM at_int_sap_materials t, at_cm_bs_coredictionary m WHERE t.matgrp_s = m.erpcode_s AND m.dictcode_s LIKE '308%' AND ( m.erpcode_s LIKE '301%' OR m.erpcode_s IN ( '301001', '301002', '301004', '301022' ) )

sql.comment: 查出物料组显示在JSP页面下拉列表处

sqls.sql: SELECT t.dictcode_s, t.erpcode_s, t.dictname_s FROM at_cm_bs_coredictionary t WHERE t.dictcode_s LIKE '308%' AND t.erpcode_s LIKE '301%' ORDER BY t.dictcode_s

sql.comment: 根据入库编号查询入库类型

sqls.sql: SELECT AC.DICTNAME_S FROM AT_CM_BS_COREDICTIONARY AC WHERE AC.DICTCODE_S = :intype_s
